executable.title: Create Superpixel Pixelmap
executable.description: Create a pixelmap image of superpixels using SLIC.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the HistomicsTK project.

file.name: outputAnnotationFile
file.label: Pixelmap Annotation
file.description: Annotation to display pixelmap on source (*.anot)

region.name: roi
region.label: Analysis ROI
region.description: Region of interest within which the analysis should be run

integer.name: tileSize
integer.label: Working tile size
integer.description: Specify the size of the working tile. If there is no overlap, superpixxel boundaries will appear at these locations.

boolean.name: overlap
boolean.label: Overlap
boolean.description: If specified, overlap tile computation to avoid edge effects.

boolean.name: boundaries
boolean.label: Boundaries
boolean.description: If specified, draw separate superpixels as boundaries around actual superpixels.

parameters.label: Category Details 1
parameters.description: Details for a category to label superpixels with. Used in the annotation file.

string.name: strokeColor_1
string.label: Stroke Color
string.description: If creating boundary superpixels, this is the color of the boundaries of superpixels with this label
